FuncDef: This command configures when to trigger, for example after one or more event occurrences. The number of occurrences of an event can be bounded by a time window or left open.

ParaDef.Info: specifies the number of times an event must occur for EHS to trigger a response. Values-2 to 15.
specifies the time window within which a specific event must occur a number of times equivalent to the specified occurrences for EHS to trigger a response. Values-1 to 604800.
